info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 1:38PM MDT by NWS GreatFalls
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Broadwater, north central Madison and southeastern Jefferson Counties through 215 PM MDT... At 136 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Whitehall, or 17 miles southeast of Butte, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Whitehall, Lewis And Clark Caverns State Park and Cardwell. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Persons in campgrounds should consider seeking sturdy shelter until this storm passes.
